sentence.Network_en: And his servitor said, What , should I set this before an hundred men?
sentence.Network_cn: 王下4:43仆人说 、 这一点岂可摆给一百人吃 呢 .

PerfectNetExp.abs: 你是我的master (主人) 还是servitor (仆人)我记得应该是master 不过有人说是 servitor 求正解啊回复海啸般的小正太  SABER被召唤的时候有说话么?不是一.

list.abs: these servitors a centaur-like hybrid a giant scorpion and a drow .这些随从是巨蝎和黑暗精灵的混合体。
In order to summon a servitor , a particular number and type of crystals are required., 为了召集仆人 , 一个特定的数量和晶体类型是必需的.

I forgive this good servitor his endeavor to hide my death from me . Hermogenes is learned ; he is even wise and his integrity well above that of the ordinary court physician .我原谅这个好心的仆人的这种向我掩饰死亡的企图，埃尔莫热纳是个学者，他甚至是个智者，他的诚实远远超过一个平庸的御医。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from late Latin, from servit- 'served', from the verb servire (see serve)

means.word_mean: 1. someone who performs the duties of an attendant for someone else
